modals.title: Simple
modals.description: A simple modal that can be dismissed by tapping outside or pressing a button.

modals.title: Animated Fade
modals.description: An animated modal that fades in and out.

modals.title: Animated Slide
modals.description: An animated modal that slides in and out.

modals.title: Blocking
modals.description: A modal that blocks interaction with the background. Appears from the bottom.

modals.title: Blurred
modals.description: A modal that blurs the background. Appears from the bottom.

modals.title: Gestured
modals.description: A modal that responds to gestures. Can be dragged

modals.title: Reanimated
modals.description: A modal that uses custom reanimated layout animations.

modals.title: In Bottom Tab
modals.description: A modal that appears above a bottom tab navigator.

modals.title: Fill Screen
modals.description: A modal that takes up the entire screen.

modals.title: With Navigation Inside
modals.description: A modal that contains a navigation stack inside it.
